actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: Concurrent resolution relative to establishing a Presidential Task Force on Prisoners of War and Missing in Action.

summary.text: Declares the sense of Congress that, simultaneously with the issuance of a general amnesty or pardon for United States draft evaders of the Vietnam era, a Presidential Task Force on Prisoners of War and Missing in Action should be established to propose courses of action to achieve the fullest possible accounting for all Americans listed as missing in Southeast Asia, including recommendations concerning Federal policies relating to prisoners of war and missing in action.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution relative to establishing a Presidential Task Force on Prisoners of War and Missing in Action.
